main event: Witnesses observed an unidentified object moving rapidly and changing shape in the sky near Ocoee, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was seen traveling from North to South at a very fast speed,The object produced a long vapor trail and was described as oval or elongated in shape,The witnesses observed the object's rapid acceleration, deceleration, and blinking lights,It disappeared behind clouds before reappearing and changing colors,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with a vapor trail
witness description: A civilian and his wife who initially thought the object was a planet or the sun.
